data.title: Office of Administrative Services
data.meta_description: Office of Administrative Services page that includes contact information along with the link to the facility use agreement for the public.
data.text:
The Office of Administrative Services is responsible for the financial management of the College, including, but not limited to: budget development and monitoring, purchase requisitions, capital improvement expenditures, and accurate accounting of all receipts and expenditures for all college accounts. The Office of Administrative Services provides management and administrative oversight of the Business Services Office, Building Services, Printing Services, Telecommunications, and the College safety program.

Traditional Hours:

Monday - Friday: 8:00am to 5:00pm

Telephone: (559) 494-3000
